verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"And the child Samuel ministered unto the LORD before Eli. And the word of the LORD was precious in those days; there was no open vision.
2 "JESUS_END"And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place, and his eyes began to wax dim, that he could not see;
3 "JESUS_END"And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the LORD, where the ark of God was, and Samuel was laid down to sleep;
4 "JESUS_END"That the LORD called Samuel: and he answered, Here am I.
5 "JESUS_END"And he ran unto Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou calledst me. And he said, I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.
6 "JESUS_END"And the LORD called yet again, Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And he answered, I called not, my son; lie down again.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-7/" title="1 Samuel 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Now Samuel did not yet know the LORD, neither was the word of the LORD yet revealed unto him.
8 "JESUS_END"And the LORD called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And Eli perceived that the LORD had called the child.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-9/" title="1 Samuel 3:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"Therefore Eli said unto Samuel, Go, lie down: and it shall be, if he call thee, that thou shalt say, Speak, LORD; for thy servant heareth. So Samuel went and lay down in his place.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-10/" title="1 Samuel 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"And the LORD came, and stood, and called as at other times, Samuel, Samuel. Then Samuel answered, Speak; for thy servant heareth.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-11/" title="1 Samuel 3:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"And the LORD said to Samuel, Behold, I will do a thing in Israel, at which both the ears of every one that heareth it shall tingle.
12 "JESUS_END"In that day I will perform against Eli all things which I have spoken concerning his house: when I begin, I will also make an end.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-13/" title="1 Samuel 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-14/" title="1 Samuel 3:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"And therefore I have sworn unto the house of Eli, that the iniquity of Eli's house shall not be purged with sacrifice nor offering for ever.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-15/" title="1 Samuel 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"And Samuel lay until the morning, and opened the doors of the house of the LORD. And Samuel feared to shew Eli the vision.
16 "JESUS_END"Then Eli called Samuel, and said, Samuel, my son. And he answered, Here am I.

17 "JESUS_END"And he said, What is the thing that the LORD hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide it not from me: God do so to thee, and more also, if thou hide any thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.
18 "JESUS_END"And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It is the LORD: let him do what seemeth him good.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-19/" title="1 Samuel 3:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"And Samuel grew, and the LORD was with him, and did let none of his words fall to the ground.
20 "JESUS_END"And all Israel from Dan even to Beersheba knew that Samuel was established to be a prophet of the LORD.

<a href="../1-Samuel-3-21/" title="1 Samuel 3:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21  "JESUS_END"And the LORD appeared again in Shiloh: for the LORD revealed himself to Samuel in Shiloh by the word of the LORD.
